nxt.db.store

Interface AccountStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FirebirdAccountStore, H2AccountStore, MariadbAccountStore, SqlAccountStore

    public interface AccountStore
    Interface for Database operations related to Accounts Created by BraindeadOne on 10.08.2017.
